author: rhuijben
msg: Fix some issues in the xml verification code in info_tests.py
* subversion/tests/cmdline/info_tests.py
(verify_xml_elements): Use unmatched_exprs instead of expr_remaining,
because the latter is not defined
(match_xml_element): Allow regular expression search for the text content
to allow more expressive checks in the future. Fixes obvious bug that
sets exprs to 'None' after the first pass.
Patch by: Sander Rijken <sander@open.collab.net>

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/ra.c
(svn_client_uuid_from_path): Use the parent working copy directory before
falling back to the network, as in every normal working copy at least the
root contains the uuid.

author: julianfoad
msg: Add reasonably full tests for "svn diff --summarize", marked "XFail".
* subversion/tests/cmdline/diff_tests.py
(full_diff_summarize): New test function.
(test_list): Add the new test as "XFail".

author: julianfoad
msg: Remove some code from the tree-conflict tests that was only there to help
debug the tests during early development.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/tree_conflict_tests.py
(ensure_tree_conflict): Remove the explicit exception reporting, thus
allowing the general exception reporting mechanism to be used.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(del_differing_file): Build paths used for checking subversion output using
platform defined separator. This fixes merge test 103 on Windows.
Patch by: Sander Rijken <sander@open.collab.net>
(log message by: me)
